document.full_text: goldman sachs group inc  partners have sold $108 million in shares in recent months, cutting their total ownership stake to about 10 percent from 11.2 percent, the new york times reported on monday.
document.title: goldman sachs partner share sales cut ownership stake: report
lines_and_colors: goldman sachs group inc  partners have sold $108 million in shares in recent months, cutting their total ownership stake to about 10 percent from 11.2 percent, the new york times reported on monday.
